pkgmetadata.longdescription: # lanms-neoImplements Locality-Aware NMS from [EAST](https://github.com/argman/EAST) that may be used across other frameworks like [mmocr](https://github.com/open-mmlab/mmocr).## Install`pip install lanms-neo`## Use```pythonfrom lanms import merge_quadrangle_n9 as la_nms```
